Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.panels

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    MovePanel  
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ActionPanel
    panel used to communicate to the player what he can do.
    BaseProdPanel
    Action panel showed when the player is making a base production
    BuyPanel
    Action panel showed when the player is buying a development card
    CrashFrame
    frame used when a connection error occurs.
    DefaultPanel
    panel that do not contains anything.
    DevProductionPanel
    Action panel showed when the player is making a development card production
    DiscountPanel  
    ExtraProdPanel
    Action panel showed when the player is making an extra production
    FirstTurnPanel  
    GamePanel
    This panel shows the dashboard of the current player watched and contains all the panels used during the game: a general action panel, SwitchToPlayerPanel and a ScrollPanel.
    LeaderboardFrame
    frame containing that displays the game's result.
    LeaderCardsPanel
    Action panel that displays a button to activate or discard the selected leader card.
    LoginPanel
    panel used when a player is logging in to the game.
    MarketPanel
    panel dialog that appears when a player has selected a column or a row at the market.
    MessagesPanel  
    MoveExtraPanel
    Action panel showed when the player is moving some resources from an extra slot to somewhere
    MoveResPanel
    Action panel showed when the player is moving some resources from a shelf of the warehouse depot to somewhere
    MoveToExtraPanel
    Action panel showed when the player is moving some resources from a shelf to a extra slot and has to choose the number of resources to move
    ScrollPanel  
    SwitchToPlayerPanel
    this class displays the players that are playing the current game and let the player to select which dashboard must be shown.
    WaitingRoomPanel
